original_text: He also walked in the ways of the house of Ahab: for his mother was his counsellor to do wickedly.
korean_text: 아하시야도 아합의 집 길로 행하였으니 이는 그의 어머니가 꾀어 악을 행하게 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: He also walked in the ways of the house of Ahab:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 또한 아합 가문의 길로 행했으니

sentences.original_text: for his mother was his counsellor
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그의 어머니가 그의 상담가가 되었고
